channel.title: Im so lost
channel.description:
[b]Help! [/b] I have tried to look at forums and understand what I need to do with mopar revolution so I can auto. I am lost on if I need to get scar or does mopar have its own autoing. I dont understand if I have to download scar or will that work with mopar and right now im confussing my self so Im just going to do a short Q & A if possible
1) Does scar work with mopar revolution or does it work on its onw 2) What all do I need to have mopar an autoer if it will even auto 3) How do I run scripts on mopar (if possible) 4) {retorical} why am I such a noob
If at all possible plz help me. [b]I really need it.[/b] [hr] :) Sry for the off topic but I would like to say that your site is amazing mopar.

item.title: Im so lost
item.dc:creator: @bryant bryant
item.description:
@bryant wrote:

Thank you for your help kyle because I was at a stand still befor I posted this and now I understand this. Big help

Read full topic

item.title: Im so lost
item.dc:creator: @KyleGut3 KyleGut3
item.description:
@KyleGut3 wrote:

1 Scar works on both Moparscape and normal RS
2 You need Scar to auto [unless you use aryan, which is standalone and doesnt need a moparscape/rs window]
3 you follow the simple tuts aroudn the forum to set up your SCAR and run
4 Because its probably your first attempt at autoing, hey we were all 'noob's at one point.

Read full topic
